translation.en: [Sergio] So, what do you wish me to say?
[woman] We're gonna have new staff members watch this video on their first day.
translation.zh: 我们将要求所有新员工 入职时观看这个视频
某种自发的忠言 是吧？

translation.en: [woman] How you came to be High Commissioner for Human Rights.
translation.zh: 你如何成为了人权事务高级专员

translation.en: [Sergio] Oh, my God. But you realize I can't summarize 34 years in three minutes.
translation.zh: 我的天 你知道我不能 在三分钟内总结34年的经验吧

translation.en: [woman] Maybe tell us where you served.
translation.zh: 那就说说你驻扎过的地方吧
柬埔寨、东帝汶、波斯尼亚

translation.en: You are asking me to recount my life.
translation.zh: 你在要我复述一遍我的人生

translation.en: My name is Sergio Vieira de Mello. I'm Brazilian,
translation.zh: 我叫塞尔吉奥维埃拉德梅洛 我是巴西人

translation.en: and I'm presently the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights.
translation.zh: 我现为联合国人权事务高级专员

translation.en: is the best opportunity you'll have in your life of achieving your dreams.
translation.zh: 是你人生中实现梦想的最佳机会

translation.en: the real challenges and the real rewards of serving the United Nations
translation.zh: 为联合国效力的真正挑战和奖励

translation.en: are out there in the field.
So, Bush is going to want you in Iraq.
We are going to Rio, that's for sure.
you can say no to everybody.
-[gasping] -[Carolina] Do you want me to show you?
[Sergio] So I just met President Bush,
translation.zh: 我刚跟布什总统会了面

translation.en: and he explained the position of the United States,
and I reminded him of the position of the United Nations on this issue.
translation.zh: 我重申了联合国 针对这一事端的立场

translation.en: I don’t think anyone can predict what the human cost of a war will be,
translation.zh: 我认为没人能预想 战争的人力成本

translation.en: [pilot on PA] Ladies and gentleman, welcome to Baghdad International.
translation.zh: 女士先生们 欢迎来到巴格达国际机场

translation.en: Current temperature is 43 degrees Celsius. Clear skies.
translation.zh: 现在的温度为43摄氏度 天气晴朗

translation.en: Just wanted to wish you guys good luck.
[George W. Bush] My fellow citizens, at this hour,
translation.zh: 我的同胞们 在这个时刻

translation.en: American and coalition forces are in the early stages of military operations.
translation.zh: 美国和联军正处于 军事行动的早期阶段

translation.en: [Dan Rather] The attack came in waves.
Cruise missiles, followed by the F-117 stealth bombers.
translation.zh: 巡航导弹 还有F-117隐形轰炸机

translation.en: [reporter] The statue of Saddam Hussein down,
translation.zh: 萨达姆侯赛因雕像倒下了

translation.en: and as it collapsed, a great roar -came out from the crowd. -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 随着它的倒塌 人群中传来大声咆哮

translation.en: There it goes. It has fallen down to the ground.
translation.zh: 好了 它坠落到地面上了

translation.en: The crowd is going mad, rushing towards it. They've been pelting it with stones.
translation.zh: 人们非常气愤 朝着它冲过去 用石头砸它

translation.en: [Bush] We thank all the citizens of Iraq who welcomed our troops.
translation.zh: 我们感谢所有欢迎 美国军队的伊拉克公民

translation.en: -Nice to meet you again. -[man] Good to see you again. How are you?
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你们 欢迎来到巴格达 先生

translation.en: [reporter] Sergio, as the president made any commitments towards peace in Iraq?
translation.zh: 总统对维护伊朗和平 做出承诺了吗？

translation.en: [Bush] A free Iraq will be ruled by laws, not by a dictator.
translation.zh: 自由的伊拉克将依法治国 而非在独裁者的统治下

translation.en: A free Iraq will be peaceful and not a friend to terrorists
translation.zh: 自由的伊朗会很和平 与恐怖分子划清界限

translation.en: or a menace to its neighbors.
translation.zh: 不会给邻里国家造成威胁

translation.en: [news anchor] Brazilian diplomat Sergio Vieira de Mello has been sent here
translation.zh: 巴西大使塞尔吉奥维埃拉德梅洛 被派来

translation.en: to find out what role the United Nations can play
translation.zh: 了解联合国可以发挥什么作用

translation.en: in an Iraq run by the United States.
The Secretary General's Special Envoy, with his long experience in trouble spots,
translation.zh: 秘书长的特使 凭借在动荡地区的长期经验

translation.en: is treading carefully in this difficult political landscape,
translation.zh: 在这个艰难的政治环境中谨慎行事

translation.en: working with, rather than against, the US
translation.zh: 与美国合作 而不是与之对抗

translation.en: while he tries to gain the trust of Iraqis.
translation.zh: 同时他尝试获得伊朗人的信任

translation.en: [reporter] We saw those riots where people were complaining
translation.zh: 我们看到了很多暴乱 人们抱怨

translation.en: that the US wasn't delivering the power and the services that they have promised.
translation.zh: 美国没有提供 他们所承诺的权力和服务

translation.en: Or if they believe that the United States is not going to make good
translation.zh: 如果他们认为美国不会兑现

translation.en: on its promises to build true democracy in Iraq,
translation.zh: 其在伊拉克建立真正民主的承诺

translation.en: this whole reconstruction effort could go up in smoke.
translation.zh: 整个重建工作可能会化为乌有

translation.en: [Bush] Other nations in history have fought in foreign lands...
translation.zh: 历史上一些派兵支援的国家

translation.en: and remain to occupy and exploit.
translation.zh: 战后仍在驻扎 剥削人民

translation.en: want nothing more than to return home.
Get back! Get back! Get back!

translation.zh: 瞧瞧这一切 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: This is Baghdad, Sergio, not Saint-Tropez.
translation.zh: 这是巴格达 塞尔吉奥 不是圣特罗佩

translation.en: -[Sergio] Stay here. -[Gil] What the hell are you doing?

translation.zh: 你好 很高兴见到你

translation.en: This is the plan. Looks like we're all on the third floor.
translation.zh: 安排是这样 似乎我们都要去三楼

translation.en: -What happened? -Ten minutes. Talk in ten minutes.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -十分钟 就谈十分钟

translation.en: you still think you can walk away after four months?
translation.zh: 你还觉得自己四个月后 可以解决完问题离开吗？

translation.en: Sergio, what did you say to that guard?
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥 你对那个警卫说了什么？

translation.en: Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven, over.
translation.zh: 解放者基地 这里是解放者七号 完毕

translation.en: Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven.
translation.zh: 解放者基地 这里是解放者七号

translation.en: Tell my wife and daughter I love them.
translation.zh: 告诉我的老婆孩子 我爱她们

translation.en: I'm Army Master Sergeant Bill Von Zehle.
translation.zh: 我是比尔冯泽勒陆军中士

translation.en: I'm going to get you out of here.
Ah. I need you to stay awake now.
[Bill] Do you know where you are?
You're at the Canal Hotel in Baghdad.
translation.zh: 你在巴格达的运河饭店

translation.en: UN headquarters. There's been an explosion.
translation.zh: 联合国总部 发生了爆炸

translation.en: Don't worry. We're going to get you out. No, no, no, no.
translation.zh: -别担心 我们会救你出去 -不

translation.en: Don't let them pull the mission out.
-[Nadya] Are you ready? -Yes, Nadya. Please bring everyone in.
translation.zh: -你准备好了吗？ -好了 纳蒂亚 请让大家进来

translation.en: On our drive in, I asked myself...
translation.zh: 我们开车进来的时候 我自问…

translation.en: if I saw foreign troops on the streets of Rio de Janeiro, my hometown.
translation.zh: 如果在家乡里约热内卢的街上 看到外国军队

translation.en: And I would want it to come to an end very, very quickly.
I see our role here as one that supports the Iraqi people
translation.zh: 我们来这里是为了 支持伊拉克人民

translation.en: to replace the coalition as soon as possible
with that behavior that we all saw on the streets.
God damn it. He got a sit-down with Ayatollah Sistani?
translation.zh: 该死 他跟阿亚图拉西斯塔尼 有个会面？

translation.en: He's not supposed to take any initiative. The UN works for us.
translation.zh: 他不该采取任何行动 联合国是为我们效力的

translation.en: Sistani won't meet anyone. I can't even get His Eminence to return my calls.
translation.zh: 西斯塔尼不跟任何人见面 法王都不回我电话

translation.en: How the hell did Sergio make that happen?
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥是怎么见到他的？

translation.en: [aide] I don't know, sir. He just went and did it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 先生 他直接杀过去见到了

translation.en: [reporter] UN envoy Sergio de Mello conferred today
translation.zh: 联合国大使塞尔吉奥德梅洛 今天与伊拉克

translation.en: with Iraq's most powerful religious leader, Ayatollah Sistani,
translation.zh: 最有权势的宗教领袖 阿亚图拉西斯塔尼进行了会谈

translation.en: in what could be a political breakthrough leading to early elections
translation.zh: 最有权势的宗教领袖 阿亚图拉西斯塔尼进行了会谈 这极会成为一次政治突破 促成提前选举 结束美国占领

translation.en: and an end to the US occupation.
translation.zh: 促成提前选举 结束美国占领

translation.en: Since arriving in Iraq, de Mello has crisscrossed the nation,
translation.zh: 促成提前选举 结束美国占领 自抵达伊拉克以来 德梅洛在国内来回奔波

translation.en: listening to ordinary citizens, many of whom are out of work
translation.zh: 自抵达伊拉克以来 德梅洛在国内来回奔波 听取普通民众的意见 很多人丢了工作 日渐绝望
很多人丢了工作 日渐绝望

translation.en: -No. You must not do that. No. -[Gaby] Step back.
translation.zh: -不 你绝不能那样做 不 -退后

translation.en: [reporter] With food shortages on the rise, frustration is at a boiling point.
translation.zh: 粮食短缺问题日渐严重 民众的沮丧情绪到了沸点

translation.en: [Carolina] We need to reopen the bridges and get people back to work
translation.zh: 我们必须重新开放桥梁 让人们回去工作

translation.en: so they can get across town,
translation.zh: 这样他们可以穿过城里

translation.en: get in their taxi, in their car, and...
-go through gates without being detained. -All good?
-King Abdullah is confirmed for Tuesday, -Mm-hmm. then to Tehran for President Khatami.
translation.zh: 阿卜杜拉国王确认了周二的会面 然后见哈塔米总统 德黑兰

translation.en: [Gaby] I'll need a list of passengers for the flight. ...they can attack us there.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们会在那里攻击我们
我的回应是 放马来吧

translation.en: We've got the force necessary to deal with the security...
translation.zh: 我们的武力足够处理安全问题

translation.en: [Sergio] I can't believe these guys are going to reopen Abu Ghraib.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信他们要 重新启动阿布格莱布监狱

translation.en: Thousands. They raid homes every night.
translation.zh: 几千个 他们每晚都袭击别人家

translation.en: This place is a powder keg.

translation.zh: 瞧瞧这个 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: They tell me the guards painted this graffiti themselves
translation.zh: 他们告诉我 这些涂鸦是狱警画的

translation.en: so the prisoners would know what was to come.
translation.zh: 提醒囚犯进来后的遭遇

translation.en: We came as liberators, my friend.
translation.zh: 我们是来解放人民的 朋友

translation.en: the Iraqi people deserve better than Saddam Hussein.
translation.zh: 伊拉克人民值得 比萨达姆侯赛因更好的统治者

translation.en: to hear that you are rebuilding Abu Ghraib.
We're mopping up resistance, Sergio. We have to put people someplace.
translation.zh: 我们在镇压抵抗 塞尔吉奥 总得找个地方关押人们

translation.en: It's not the message you want to send, Paul.
translation.zh: 这不是你想传递的信息 保罗

translation.en: Let me worry about that, okay?
but surprises make Washington very nervous.
translation.zh: 但惊喜让华盛顿很紧张

translation.en: Sistani for a start. That doesn't help.
translation.zh: 你去见了西斯塔尼 这可没帮上忙

translation.en: It gives the impression I'm not in control.
translation.zh: 大家会认为我控制不住形势

translation.en: My conversation with Sistani went really well.
translation.zh: 我跟西斯塔尼聊得很好

translation.en: if we hold elections under an Iraqi constitution.
translation.zh: 如果我们按伊朗宪法办选举

translation.en: We have our own plan for elections.
the worse it will get. Please trust me.
translation.zh: 情况就越糟糕 请相信我
你不是总督 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: [reporter] Did you agree on what role the UN will play here?
translation.zh: 联合国将要发挥的作用 是否已经达成共识？

translation.en: Uh, my good friend Sergio and I had a productive discussion
translation.zh: 我和好朋友塞尔吉奥 通过建设性的讨论

translation.en: covering a range of issues. We both agree on a peaceful and free Iraq.
translation.zh: 谈到了一系列问题 我们都支持伊朗的和平与解放

translation.en: The role of the UN is something we are working to define.
translation.zh: 联合国在其中的角色尚未定论
很高兴见到你 保罗

translation.en: -You too, Sergio. -[man] That's it, folks. No more questions.
translation.zh: -我也是 塞尔吉奥 -好了 各位 提问环节结束

translation.en: [reporter] Will there be any reopening of the Abu Ghraib prison you can speak of?
translation.zh: 您能谈谈 阿布格莱布监狱的重启吗？

translation.en: You were with Paul Bremer at Abu Ghraib.
translation.zh: 重启监狱的问题 您和保罗布雷默立场相同

translation.en: Is the UN just a cover for the American occupation?
translation.zh: 联合国只是美国的代理人吗？

translation.en: and Sergio Vierira de Mello, representing the Secretary-General,
translation.zh: 以及代表秘书长的 塞尔吉奥维埃拉德梅洛

translation.en: are no tool and no cover for anyone.
translation.zh: 不是任何人的工具和代理人

translation.en: Secretary-General Kofi Annan and myself are independent.
translation.zh: 秘书长科菲安南和我都是独立的

translation.en: So don't suggest for a second
we are here supporting the United States or the coalition.
translation.zh: 我们是来支持美国或者联军

translation.en: Pull together everything we know about the occupation.
translation.zh: 收集所有战后占领的资料
阿布格莱布 所有一切

translation.en: We will send a full dossier to the Security Council tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: 明天上午发给安理会 一份完整的档案

translation.en: Let's do this. No time to waste.
translation.zh: 立马行动 没时间浪费

translation.en: -[Carolina] Let's add an appendix... -Okay, I'll review it.
translation.zh: -再加一个附录… -好 我会检查

translation.en: ...to the economics section with all the data.
A little more coffee in your sugar?
This will be a long night.
We'll need a strong cover note for the dossier.
translation.zh: 我们需要一份强有力的开卷

translation.en: [Carolina in English] We need to tell the world what's happening here.
translation.zh: 告诉全世界这里的真实情况

translation.en: Wait. Is this going public, or is it just for the Security Council?
translation.zh: 等等 这份档案要公开 还是只给安理会看？

translation.en: The Americans are going to go nuts with this.
-Sergio-- -No, let's not make it worse. No.
translation.zh: -塞尔吉奥… -不 别让事情更糟

translation.en: [Bill] Can you move your leg, Sergio?
translation.zh: 腿能动吗 塞尔吉奥？

translation.en: Can you move any parts of your body, other than the ones I've seen?
translation.zh: 除了可见的部位 其他地方动得了吗？

translation.en: I just want to know. Don't--
-[Sergio sobs and groans] -Just stay relaxed. Stay relaxed.
What can I do for you?
Sergio, that was, uh, quite a performance you had there.
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥 发言强势啊

translation.en: No tool, no cover for anyone not here...
translation.zh: 不是任何人的工具和代理人

translation.en: I honestly believe this serves both our interests, Paul.
translation.zh: 说实话 我觉得这符合双方利益 保罗

translation.en: If the Iraqis know the UN is independent,
translation.zh: 如果伊朗知道联合国是独立个体

translation.en: then the elections we supervise will be seen as legitimate.
translation.zh: 那么我们监督下的选举 会被认为是公正合法

translation.en: And if the elections are legitimate, Paul, then...
translation.zh: 如果选举公正合法 保罗 那么…

translation.en: then we can all go home.
I've decided there won't be any elections,
translation.zh: 我已经决定取消选举了

translation.en: I also decided something I needed to share with you.
translation.zh: 我也有个决定 想要告诉你

translation.en: we'll send the Security Council a full dossier concerning the occupation
translation.zh: 我们会提交安理会 一份关于战后占领的完整档案

translation.en: and its many human rights violations, Paul.
translation.zh: 罗列出违反的多条人权 保罗

translation.en: You know what? Hang on, hang on. Pull over.
Pull over. Give me one second.
A dossier to the Security Council? You can't do that, Sergio.
translation.zh: 一份提交给安理会的档案？ 你不能那么做 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: With all due respect, Paul, you have no authority
translation.zh: 恕我直言 保罗 你无权

translation.en: to tell me what I can or cannot do.
[Bremer] The Security Council mandate is very clear.
translation.zh: 安理会的指令非常明确 你过来

translation.en: You're here to support our effort to stabilize and rebuild Iraq.
translation.zh: 安理会的指令非常明确 你过来 支持我们稳定、重建伊朗的工作

translation.en: -That's the only reason you're here. -The only reason I'm here
translation.zh: -这是你在这的唯一原因 -我之所以来这里

translation.en: -how to put it back together again. -Sergio...

translation.zh: 你很有雄心 我承认
你很有雄心 我承认 但攻击美国可不会助你 当上下一任秘书长

translation.en: isn't the best way to become the next Secretary-General,
translation.zh: 但攻击美国可不会助你 当上下一任秘书长

translation.en: [Gaby] Security-wise, there will be three. There's going to be Gil and Sergio.
translation.zh: 三位安保人员 保护吉尔和塞尔吉奥

translation.en: We might stay overnight if something happens, okay?
translation.zh: 以防万一 我们整晚都会在 好吗？

translation.en: [man] Carolina, here's the economics section with all your final notes.
translation.zh: 卡罗琳娜 按你注释 -修改后的经济部分 -谢谢

translation.en: Call a press conference for 9:00 a.m., before DC wakes up.
translation.zh: 早上九点召开新闻发布会 赶在华盛顿上班前

translation.en: A press conference? We're going public?
translation.zh: 新闻发布会？我们要对外公布？

translation.en: The world has a right to know what's going on here.
translation.zh: 世界有权了解这里的真实情况

translation.en: no more Oval Office visits for you.
translation.zh: 你可不会被邀请去白宫了

translation.en: -What happened? -[Bill] We're going to get you out.
translation.zh: -发生什么事了？ -我们会救你出去

translation.en: Hey, Gil? Gil, are you okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 吉尔？吉尔 你还好吗？

translation.en: Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven.
translation.zh: 解放者基地 这里是解放者七号

translation.en: inside the building near the ground level, under the pancaked portion of the roof.
translation.zh: 楼里底层位置 困在被压扁的屋顶下
收到了吗？ 我的女儿们

translation.en: [Bill] I've got a daughter too. They're pretty special, huh?
translation.zh: 我也有个女儿 她们很特别 对吧？

translation.en: Liberator Base, I have survivors. I repeat, I have survivors.
translation.zh: 解放者基地 发现幸存者 重复 发现幸存者 请确认 完毕
重复 发现幸存者 请确认 完毕

translation.en: [Bill] Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven. Do you copy?
translation.zh: 解放者基地 这里是解放者七号 收到了吗？

translation.en: I'm sure when he notices I'm missing, he'll...
translation.zh: 我相信当他找不到我后 他会...
-塞尔吉奥 塞尔吉奥德梅洛 -是

translation.en: Well, you're not allowed to go missing.
Nothing quite like the sound of a Kalashnikov in the morning.
translation.zh: 没什么比得上大清早就听到 AK-47突击步枪的声音

translation.en: I guess our ceasefire has yet to take hold.
translation.zh: 看来停火协议还没生效

translation.en: It's an LMG version. Six hundred rounds per minute.
translation.zh: 轻机枪 每分钟六百发

translation.en: I need to get back. Maybe you do too.
translation.zh: 我得回去了 你也是

translation.en: [Gaby] I can't protect you like that.
At least you have to let me know where you are.
translation.zh: 至少得让我知道你的位置

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry. It came from there, I think. Right in the woods.
translation.zh: 我知道 抱歉 我觉得声音从那边传来 树林里

translation.en: We'll take him to the collection point.

translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥！ 塞尔吉奥！

translation.en: Hey, guys, set me up a perimeter all the way around.
translation.zh: 各位 周围设置警戒线

translation.en: Get these walking wounded out of here!
You guys post up here. Nobody gets through.
translation.zh: 你们守在这里 谁都不能进

translation.en: [anchor] We have this breaking news to tell you about.
There has been a blast at UN Headquarters in Baghdad.
translation.zh: 巴格达的联合国总部发生爆炸

translation.en: It happened at the Canal Hotel.
An unknown number of wounded are there now,
and there are medical choppers apparently hovering above.
translation.zh: 医疗直升机在空中待命

translation.en: A massive rescue effort underway to extract dozens of people
translation.zh: 大规模救援工作已经开始

translation.en: possibly still trapped inside the UN Headquarters.
translation.zh: 致力于救出 可能还困在楼里的数十人

translation.en: [anchor 2] One side of that building looks like it's suffered considerable damage,
translation.zh: 建筑的一侧看起来 遭受了严重的破坏

translation.en: completely collapsing on one wall there.
Some people reporting windows shattered as far as a kilometer away.
translation.zh: 有人报告说破碎的窗户 被炸到了一公里远
他们很快就能救我们出去

translation.en: [Sergio] I don't believe in being fashionably late either.
translation.zh: 我也不爱故意迟到那一套

translation.en: No. For a diplomatic meeting, never.
translation.zh: 不 出席外交会议的话 绝不行

translation.en: So there are some occasions that call for being late?
translation.zh: 所以有些场合迟到是可以的？

translation.en: My mother taught me always keep them waiting and leave them wanting more.
translation.zh: 母亲教我 要让他们心急火燎 渴求更多
顺便说句 我叫卡罗琳娜
卡罗琳娜拉瑞埃拉 阿根廷人

translation.en: Quit Wall Street to come out here and change the world.
translation.zh: 辞掉了华尔街的工作 跑来这里改变世界

translation.en: Economic advisor to our transitional government.
translation.zh: 当过渡政府的经济顾问

translation.en: That's something my mother taught me.
what do you think of our prospects?
I think if you do your job, I will do mine.
translation.zh: 你做好分内事 我也会如此

translation.en: -Sergio, he's here. -[Sergio] That's not what I meant.
translation.zh: -塞尔吉奥 他来了 -我不是这个意思
-我知道 -他来了 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Nice to finally meet you.
It's an honor and a privilege to serve East Timor.
translation.zh: 为东帝汶服务是我的荣幸

translation.en: Mr. de Mello, I've heard a lot about you.
translation.zh: 德梅洛先生 你大名远扬

translation.en: [in English] The world's Mr. Fix-It they call you, right?
translation.zh: 大家叫你世界的搞定先生 对吗？
久而久之 我们会利用

translation.en: [in English] What modalities do you envision for us, Mr. de Mello?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们该采用哪种定式 德梅洛先生？

translation.en: Well, a total ceasefire for a start.
You know, I recently met with the prime minister of Cambodia,
translation.zh: 最近 我见了柬埔寨的首相

translation.en: and he told me to beware of you guys.
He told me that the UN ran around his country for two years
translation.zh: 联合国在柬埔寨忙了两年

translation.en: There is a different side to that story.
And if you'll allow me to introduce you to our...
-our Deputy Administrator. -Gusmao, nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -我们的副署长 -很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Daniel Travers, Finance Minister.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 -丹尼尔特拉弗斯 财政部长

translation.en: Doctor Faith Abujia, Minister of Health.
translation.zh: 卫生部长 菲斯阿布嘉医生

translation.en: You have quick fixes for complex issues, don't you?
Indonesia wants to wipe my country off the map.
translation.zh: 印度尼西亚想将我的国家 从地图上抹去 德梅洛先生

translation.en: We don't have time for UN modalities
translation.zh: 我们没时间采取联合国的方式

translation.en: that led to the death of millions in Bosnia and Rwanda
translation.zh: 让数百万波斯尼亚人和卢旺达人送命

translation.en: while UN peacekeepers simply watched. You can't judge what you don't know.
translation.zh: -联合国维和人员却冷眼旁观 -你不了解事实 不该妄下断言
我们从错误中吸取了教训

translation.en: Of course. Now you need a success story.
translation.zh: 当然 现在你需要一个成功的案例

translation.en: We've fought for our independence for 24 years
translation.zh: 过去24年里 我们为独立而战

translation.en: We're not going to be your experiment.
translation.zh: 我们不会成为你的实验品
和受爱戴的领袖才能戴

translation.en: I think I may be here longer than planned.
translation.zh: 我可能得多待一段时间

translation.en: And what else did your mother teach you?
To beware of wandering married men.
translation.zh: 小心居无定所的已婚男人

translation.en: The most powerful official in UN history.
translation.zh: 联合国历史上最权威的官员

translation.en: what to do with all that power?
You had it coming, you know.
Getting ripped a new asshole in front of everybody.
If I was General Gusmao, you know what I'd think?
translation.zh: 如果我是古斯芒将军 你猜我怎么想？

translation.en: I'd think Sergio Vieira de Mello
translation.zh: 塞尔吉奥维埃拉德梅洛

translation.en: is here to cut a deal with the Indonesians, sell out the rebels,
translation.zh: 想与印度尼西亚人做交易 出卖反叛分子

translation.en: And he was right to bring up Cambodia.
Still no justice for two million dead.
translation.zh: 死去的两百万人仍然死不瞑目

translation.en: -[men yelling] -[Gil] I have family. Please don't shoot. [Sergio] Okay. Yes, yes, yes.
Stay together. Do as they say.
translation.zh: 待在一起 大家别分开

translation.en: All he has to do is nod his head and we're dead.
translation.zh: 只要他点头 我们就死定了

translation.en: [Gil] What the hell are you doing? Sergio?
[in English] What the hell is going on?
The Sorbonne. Of course. Why not?
translation.zh: 索邦大学 一点都不意外

translation.en: And I still have a scar
or to embrace the armed struggle.
I don't believe in demanding the impossible anymore,
but I'm going to do the best I can
to bring those refugees back home.
at a certain point of our lives...
I have a title for your autobiography.
translation.zh: 我想好你的自传标题了

translation.en: Well, I wish you'd listen to it sometimes.
translation.zh: 希望你能听听 我这个“良心”的话

translation.en: [Gaby] This is Sergio de Mello. He has a meeting with General Gusmao.
translation.zh: 这位是塞尔吉奥德梅洛 他与古斯芒将军约好会面

translation.en: No. We don't allow anyone to meet our leader today.
translation.zh: 不行 领袖今天不会客

translation.en: He's the administrator of East Timor.
translation.zh: 他是东帝汶的管理人员

translation.en: No. We not allow anyone to meet our leader today.
translation.zh: 不行 领袖今天不会客
早上好 早上好 先生

translation.en: I'm Sergio Vieira de Mello. I have a meeting scheduled with General Gusmao
translation.zh: 我是塞尔吉奥比埃拉德梅洛 我与见古斯芒将军约好会面

translation.en: Could you please tell him I'm here?
How do you spell your name?
-[Sergio] This is gonna take forever. -[Gaby] Yeah.
-I'll find you. -Just let me know if, uh...
You chew and your mouth gets red.
translation.zh: 慢慢嚼咽 口唇变红

translation.en: I should ask you the same.
How will you win him over?
Well, I think he has to understand that I'm not his enemy.
I have no idea how to do it.
Listen, I was just about to leave, but I think...
translation.zh: 我本来要走了 但我觉得…

translation.en: I think I have to show you something, if you have time.
translation.zh: 必须得带你去个地方 如果你有空

translation.en: [Carolina] You know, sometimes change starts small.
translation.zh: 有时候变化的开端很小

translation.en: This is the Bobometo Collective, our pilot project.
translation.zh: 这是波波门托集体公司 我们的试点项目

translation.en: We give these women start-up loans.
translation.zh: 我们给这些女人启动贷款

translation.en: People want to work. They want dignity.
translation.zh: 人们想工作 他们想要尊严
-克劳蒂亚 -早上好 一切可好？

translation.en: And so finally they can earn a living by doing what they've done for centuries.
translation.zh: 现在 终于 她们可以利用世代相传的手艺谋生

translation.en: This project really shows the power of microfinance.
translation.zh: 这个项目展现了小额信贷的大用

translation.en: many more like this one around the country.

translation.zh: -这位是圣诺李娜 你好 圣诺李娜 -你好

translation.en: She lost everything, including two sons, killed by the militia.
translation.zh: 她失去了一切 包括两名被民兵杀害的儿子

translation.en: I think you'd like to talk to her.
translation.zh: 我觉得你会想跟她谈谈

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Good morning. How are you?
We have been waiting for the future to arrive.
What do you want most for your future?
translation.zh: 你对未来的期许是什么？

translation.en: If I tell you what I want...
I don't think you would understand.
Really? I can make an effort to try.
translation.zh: 真的吗？我可以努力去理解

translation.en: I want to go up into the sky...
to the place where I was born.
I completely understand what you want.
tell the world to see us
-Can I give you a hug? -[Senhorinha responds in Portuguese]
-Thank you. Thank you. -[Senhorinha responds in Portuguese]
translation.zh: 谢谢 塞尔吉奥 谢谢 -谢谢你 先生 -谢谢你 谢谢

translation.en: How beautiful what you just told me.
translation.zh: 你刚告诉我的一切太美了

translation.en: -I love this rain. -It rains every day at the same time?
translation.zh: -我喜欢这里的雨 -每天这时候都会下

translation.en: I have a message from General Gusmao.
translation.zh: 我带来了古斯芒将军的口信

translation.en: He wants the president of Indonesia to apologize.
translation.zh: 他想要印度尼西亚总统的道歉

translation.en: he wants full independence for East Timor.
translation.zh: 他希望东帝汶彻底独立

translation.en: [soldier] There you go. Sit right here. There you go. Easy, easy, easy.
translation.zh: 坐这里 好了 放松

translation.en: There you go, there you go.
Okay? Hold that right there. That's it. There you go.
translation.zh: 好吗？抓住 就这样 好了

translation.en: -[Bill] Hey! -[man] You need any help down there?
[Bill] Hell, yes. Have you got any experience?
translation.zh: 当然了 你有救援经验吗？

translation.en: -[Bill] Well, get down here, buddy. -[man] I'm coming, brother.
translation.zh: -下来 哥们 -我来了 兄弟

translation.en: -All right. I'm Andre. -I'm Bill. Boy, am I glad to see you.
translation.zh: 好了 我是安德烈 我是比尔 很高兴认识你

translation.en: This is Gil. He's lucid. BP, 100/60.
translation.zh: 这是吉尔 意识清醒 血压100/60
塞尔吉奥 意识清醒

translation.en: Both pinned from the hips down.
I used my only IV on Gil.
translation.zh: 我把唯一的点滴给吉尔用了

translation.en: We need to extract him first.
translation.zh: 我们需要先把他拉出来

translation.en: -[Gil] That doesn't sound good. -[Bill] My comms are down.
translation.zh: 听起来不妙 我的通讯坏了

translation.en: I'm calling. I'm getting zero response.
translation.zh: 我一直在叫人 但无人应答

translation.en: [Andre] Army Corps of Engineers, they've got the equipment we need at Baghdad Airport.
translation.zh: 陆军工程兵团 他们在巴格达机场 拥有我们需要的设备

translation.en: Use my call signal, Nomad Two.
translation.zh: 用我的呼号 游牧二号

translation.en: and they can get it done.
[Bill] Nomad Base, this is Nomad Two.
translation.zh: 游牧基地 这里是游牧二号

translation.en: [man on radio] Nomad Two, this is Nomad Base. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 游牧二号 这里是游牧基地 请讲

translation.en: You've always managed to defy the odds.
-So far. -[Bill] We need an extraction team
translation.zh: -直到现在 -我们需要救援小队

translation.en: -I need you to give me a hand. -Get him up.
[man on radio] Copy that. We'll start looking for the gear now.
translation.zh: 收到 我们立马开始找设备

translation.en: -[medic 1] Come right here, miss. -[Carolina] You should go.
translation.zh: -过来这边 女士 -你该走了

translation.en: We're going to get you up and in the truck right here.
Sit in the back of the truck.
[medic 1] Okay? Sit in the truck. You're in the back.
-[medic 1] You're good. -[Carolina] You are going home.
Are you okay? Yes, I'm fine!
translation.zh: -你没事吧？ -我没事 塞尔吉奥！

translation.en: [in English] Hey. Gaby, we need water.
translation.zh: 嘿 盖比 我们需要水

translation.en: We're also waiting on our heavy equipment.
translation.zh: 我们还在等 -重型设备 -好

translation.en: -Yes. -We're running out of time. Can you light a fire under somebody's ass?
translation.zh: 我们没时间了 能去催催吗？

translation.en: Everyone is good, Sergio. Everyone is good.
translation.zh: 大家都很好 塞尔吉奥 大家都好

translation.en: -[Gil] You don't need to do this now. -[Sergio] I've got it, Gil.
translation.zh: -你不必这么做 -没事的 吉尔
-拜托 别劝了 -等等 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: I did not come halfway around the world to take orders from--
translation.zh: 我大老远飞来 不是为了听令于…

translation.en: From a Timorese rebel with a high school education.
translation.zh: 一个高中文凭的东帝汶反叛军

translation.en: We were sent here to run East Timor.
translation.zh: 我们被派来管理东帝汶

translation.en: -We were sent here to run... -We know what we're doing.
translation.zh: -我们被派来… -我们有足够的资历

translation.en: Oh, I see. So we all give up power to the Timorese, except for you.
translation.zh: 我懂了 帝汶人拿走了 我们所有人的权力 除了你

translation.en: -Is that it? -If you don't like it...
-I don't like it. -...you're free to go.
-You're free to go. Then go. -I don't like it.
translation.zh: -我不喜欢 -…你可以走 那就走

translation.en: We were sent here as overlords.
translation.zh: 我们作为统治者被派来这里

translation.en: we can leave as respected colleagues.
translation.zh: 离开这里时 我们是受人尊敬的同僚

translation.en: we take our orders directly from you.
Because what we are about to do here...
translation.zh: 因为我们将要做的事情…

translation.en: the first new nation of the 21st century.
Stand up. Come here. Come closer.
translation.zh: 站起来 过来 靠近点

translation.en: Gil, why don't you introduce yourself?
translation.zh: 吉尔 你为什么不自我介绍？

translation.en: My name is Gil Loescher and, um...
[in English] "His life is the pursuit of a pursuit forever.
It is the future that creates his present.
All is an interminable chain of longing."
Your boys, how old are they?
translation.zh: 你的儿子们现在多少岁？

translation.en: And the other one is 19 now.
And how often do you see them?
[in Portuguese] Shrimp moqueca with red palm oil.

translation.zh: -你从哪买的？ -巴伊亚 拿撒勒的面粉？

translation.en: So good to see you here with the kids.
translation.zh: 很高兴看到你来陪孩子们

translation.en: [reporter in English] The United Nations started returning 400,000 Cambodian refugees,
translation.zh: 联合国开始遣返四十万柬埔寨难民

translation.en: part of a peace deal with the notorious Khmer Rouge that no one thought possible.
translation.zh: 这是与臭名昭着的红色高棉 达成的和平协议中的条款 之前没人认为这是可能的

translation.en: Don't be sorry. It's not your fault if your daddy didn't teach you Portuguese.
translation.zh: 不用抱歉 不是你的错 怪你爸爸没教你们葡萄牙语

translation.en: Nor that your grandma, the wife of a diplomat, can't speak French.
translation.zh: 也不怪你奶奶不会法语 虽然身为外交官夫人

translation.en: [maid in Portuguese] You're going to love it!
[Sergio] Look at the size of this shrimp.
[in English] This is from Lurdes' hometown, Salvador.
translation.zh: 来自卢尔德故乡萨尔瓦多的特产

translation.en: It's called moqueca, and it's probably the best Brazilian food
translation.zh: 海鲜杂烩 应该会是你吃到过的

translation.en: I'm just not very hungry right now.
and we decided to give the boys a stable home...
translation.zh: 为了让儿子们成长在 一个稳定的家庭环境里
我们决定让他们 跟妈妈在日内瓦生活

translation.en: My work is in the field.
When I'm on a mission, I...
in order to get the job done within a certain time frame.
I think I'm not very good at...
We are about to indulge ourselves.
[Sergio in Spanish] I have a song for you.
-[soldier] You can't get in. -[Carolina] Come on. Let me in.
translation.zh: 你不能进去 拜托 让我进去！

translation.en: I need to get in! I need to get in!
Under no circumstances should any Muslim
translation.zh: 任何穆斯林或理智的人

translation.en: or sane person resort to the United Nations.
translation.zh: 都不该去求助于联合国

translation.en: The UN is nothing but a tool of crime.
translation.zh: 联合国的本质是犯罪工具

translation.en: We are being massacred every day,
while the United Nations sits idly by.
[in Spanish] Do you want some tea?
[Sergio in French] Is your brother with you?
-I'm sure I don't need to tell you this-- -But you're going to anyway.
translation.zh: -不用我提醒你… -但你还是会说

translation.en: We are reaching out to the same government
that was slaughtering the Timorese for decades.
translation.zh: 几十年来一直在屠杀东帝汶人

translation.en: Are you sure you're all right?
I want to fall from the sky...
in the place where I belong.
[whispering] What the fuck did you just say?

translation.zh: -拜托 -谢谢你 （印度尼西亚总统 古斯杜尔）

translation.en: because the people of East Timor, in a plebiscite,
translation.zh: 因为东帝汶的人民正在举行

translation.en: That's how they want to be seen...
by the rest of the world.
And for the 24 years of Indonesian domination,
translation.zh: 在印度尼西亚24年的统治下

translation.en: I'm sorry to deny you a diplomatic breakthrough,
translation.zh: 我很遗憾否认你的外交突破

translation.en: but the world is not that simple.
translation.zh: 但这个世界没那么简单

translation.en: The age of occupation is over,

translation.zh: 让世人认同他们的身份

translation.en: Because the way you look at them...
translation.zh: 因为您看待他们的方式…

translation.en: will determine the way the whole world
[in English] It's been abandoned since the Civil War.
translation.zh: 这里内战后就被荒废了

translation.en: and they were hoping to find the Spice Islands.
translation.zh: 他们本想找到香料群岛

translation.en: So the Indonesians are going to apologize?
translation.zh: 印度尼西亚人会道歉吗？

translation.en: [in Spanish] You don't have to do that.
[in English] The mission is almost over, isn't it?
translation.zh: 任务基本完成 是吗？

translation.en: I know what I want for my life, Sergio.
translation.zh: 我清楚自己想要什么样的生活 塞尔吉奥

translation.en: I'm not going to wait for you to decide what you want for yours.
translation.zh: 你没想清楚自己想要的生活 我等不了

translation.en: My guys called the base commander.
translation.zh: 我的手下呼叫了基地指挥官
他们甚至求助布雷默的办公室

translation.en: Any other city in the world
translation.zh: 世界上的任何其他城市

translation.en: and these guys are evac'd by now, you know that.
translation.zh: 这些人早就撤离了 你知道的

translation.en: It doesn't look that way, no.
This is Baghdad, Sergio, not Saint-Tropez.
translation.zh: 这里是巴格达 塞尔吉奥 不是圣特罗佩

translation.en: [soldier] Yes, sir. All right, on me!
He says he doesn't want the locals to think the UN is part of the occupation.
translation.zh: 他说不想让当地人认为 联合国参与了战后占领

translation.en: We wouldn't want that, would we?

translation.zh: 抱歉 老板 就这么多

translation.en: The most powerful army on earth...
and this is the best you can do?
The best they could do was to put tanks guarding our headquarters.
translation.zh: 他们只会尽全力部署坦克 守护我们的总部

translation.en: -What the fuck were you thinking? -What the fuck are you talking about?
translation.zh: -你他妈在想什么？ -你他妈在说什么？

translation.en: The moment we got to Baghdad,
you put all our lives at risk.
translation.zh: 你就把我们所有人置于险地

translation.en: [Gil] Good decision, Sergio. Which is more than you ever do.
translation.zh: -真是个好决定 塞尔吉奥 -比你做过的决定都好

translation.en: -Fuck you. -Everybody try to stay positive, okay?
translation.zh: -去你的 -大家保持乐观 好吗？

translation.en: We'll try to stay positive as you fill your purse with rocks.
translation.zh: 当你开始用包装石头时 我们会尽量保持乐观的

translation.en: Sergio, did you really just tell the guards to leave?
translation.zh: -塞尔吉奥… -你当真让 守卫离开了吗？

translation.en: [in French] We need to assess the security situation.
translation.zh: 我们需要评估安保情况

translation.en: [in English] Qabush, can you please close the door?
translation.zh: 卡布什 请你关下门

translation.en: We have no choice but to work with the Americans.
But we cannot hide behind their wall of armor.
translation.zh: 但我们不能躲在弹药墙的后面

translation.en: more clear to me than ever
translation.zh: 我比任何时候都要清楚…

translation.en: and why I asked you, my colleagues, my friends, to join me on this mission
translation.zh: 我请你们 我的同事们 我的朋友们 一同完成这个任务

translation.en: and why this mission requires the very best...
translation.zh: 因为这个任务需要最好的…

translation.en: of the United Nations diplomatic corps.
We are not here to fix Iraq...
translation.zh: 我们不是来解决伊朗问题…

translation.en: or to tell its people what to do.
We have to face the Iraqi people openly.
translation.zh: 我们必须开诚布公地… 面对伊朗人民

translation.en: Openly as ourselves, as the United Nations because this is who we are.
translation.zh: 真诚待人 代表自己 代表联合国 因为这是我们的本质

translation.en: And this is what we do best.
All right. Do you have our election templates?
translation.zh: 好了 你有我们的选举模板吗？

translation.en: From Timor and Kosovo. We're ready.
translation.zh: 从帝汶到科索沃 我们准备好了

translation.en: I just want to let you know we found Sergio inside.
translation.zh: 我们发现塞尔吉奥在里头

translation.en: Let's get him out. Get him out.
translation.zh: 救他出来 救他出来

translation.en: [Blitzer] How big of an explosion, in other words, was this?
translation.zh: 换句话说 爆炸有多猛烈？

translation.en: Well, the UN building in the Canal Hotel is quite separate from other buildings.
translation.zh: 运河饭店的联合国大楼很偏僻
-马歇尔先生 等等 -没多少…

translation.en: Hold on one second because Paul Bremer,
translation.zh: 稍等 美国驻伊拉克长官

translation.en: the Chief US Administrator in Iraq, is speaking right now,
and I want our viewers to hear what he has to say.
As of this time, my dear friend Sergio...
translation.zh: 现在 我亲爱的朋友塞尔吉奥…

translation.en: back there. We're doing everything we can to get him out.
translation.zh: 某个地方 我们在竭尽全力救他出来

translation.en: He may well have been the target of this attack
translation.zh: 他很有可能是此次袭击的目标

translation.en: which will only strengthen our resolve to fight terror...
translation.zh: 这只会加强我们对抗恐怖主义的决心
一旦发现 决不姑息

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you very much.
As soon as we know anything, uh,
-[Andre] Are you okay? -It's getting harder to breathe.
I need you to understand something.
to get you out of here...
[Bill] We're going to have to amputate both your legs, Gil.
translation.zh: 我们得截断你的双腿 吉尔

translation.en: I've already given you the maximum dose of morphine. Any more and it'd kill you.
translation.zh: 我已经给你注射了最大剂量的吗啡 再多一点就会致命

translation.en: You do whatever it takes to get us out.
translation.zh: 尽你所能救我们出去吧

translation.en: [tearfully] Get me back to my family.
We'll get you out of here.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

translation.zh: 一 二 三 起

translation.en: Okay. Stay there. All right. All right.
-Pull us up. -[Andre and Bill grunting with effort]
-Can you just wait for a minute? -[driver] Yes.
So, you say you have some papers for me?
"All is an interminable chain of longing."
can you tell me right now...
right now, what do you want?
where an outcropping of rocks meets the sea at...
This is a place where my father...
still today I return the moment I arrive in Rio.
translation.zh: 我每次回到里约 首先去的地方

translation.en: I want to go back home.
I want to go back to Brazil.
being what people expect me to be.
it's not an easy thing for me to do.
I want to see this country independent...
translation.zh: 我想见证这个国家的独立…

translation.en: You'd better be fucking sure 'cause I want you too.
translation.zh: 你最好非常坚定 因为我也想要你

translation.en: There you go. All right, buddy.
[man] Y'all get ready to send them home.
[man on radio] Okay, they're going back in. Get the stretcher ready.
translation.zh: 好 他们要回去了 准备好担架

translation.en: -You need to leave the area now. -I won't leave!
translation.zh: -你必须立马离开这里 -我不走！

translation.en: -You can't get through. -I can't! I can't!
-I need to make it there, you understand? -Listen--
translation.zh: -我必须到那里去 你明白吗？ -听着…

translation.en: -I need to go. -You can't be here.
-Listen to me! Why are you stopping me? -You have to go.
translation.zh: -听我说！你为什么阻止我？ -你必须走

translation.en: -It is too dangerous. -Why? I need to find him.
I need to be with my Sergio. Do you hear me?
translation.zh: 我必须跟我的塞尔吉奥在一起 你听到了吗？

translation.en: -Sergio de Mello? -Yes! I need to go.
translation.zh: -塞尔吉奥德梅洛？ -对！我必须去
-盖比！ -过来这边 他在这 塞尔吉奥在这
-在这上面 -你能让我看看他吗？

translation.en: -But you can talk to him. -[Carolina sobbing]
Sergio, my love, are you there?
[in Spanish] Sergio, my love, I am here!
[in English] Do you remember that night in East Timor?
translation.zh: 你记得在东帝汶的那一晚吗？

translation.en: Listen, there are at least three official parties tonight.
translation.zh: 听着 今晚至少有三个官方的派对

translation.en: Bill Clinton wants you at his, so does Kofi.
translation.zh: 比尔克林顿邀请了你 科菲也是

translation.en: We're not going to any of those.
I know what I want to do tonight.

translation.zh: 晚安 盖比 再见

translation.en: [man in English] Hey, all right, Sergio!
we need you to clear the area.
Ma'am, we're bringing the heavy equipment in.
translation.zh: 女士 我们要放重型器械进去

translation.en: -We need you out of there. -[speaking in Spanish]
-I'm bringing the heavy equipment in. -I'm not leaving.
translation.zh: -我们要放重型器械进去 -我不走

translation.en: -I'm not leaving. -You need to get out now.
Carolina, let's go now. Let's go. It's better.
translation.zh: 卡罗琳娜 我们走吧 那样更好

translation.en: [Bush on TV] Military conflict could be difficult.
An Iraqi regime faced with its own demise
may attempt cruel and desperate measures.
translation.zh: 它可能会采取残酷和绝望的措施

translation.en: UN Envoy Sergio de Mello was in the Oval Office today,
translation.zh: 联合国特使塞尔吉奥德梅洛 今天来到了总统办公室…

translation.en: urging President Bush to work through the Security Council
You ask questions or do you want to hear from me?
translation.zh: 你是想提问 还是听我说？

translation.en: I just met President Bush, and he explained
translation.zh: 我刚跟布什总统会了面 他解释了美国的立场

translation.en: the position of the United States.
-And I reminded him-- -[waiter] Sir, your table is ready.
translation.zh: -我重申了… -先生 您的桌子准备好了

translation.en: Thank you. Bye-bye. Bye, Sergio. ...what the human cost of a war...
translation.zh: 我认为没人能预想 战争的人力成本

translation.en: Bush is going to want you in Iraq.
He didn't formally ask but it's coming.
translation.zh: 他还没正式提出 但早晚的事

translation.en: [in Spanish] What are you going to do?
[in English] We are going to Rio, that's for sure.
it's going to be four months.
I'm only going if you're going.
[in Spanish] Sergio, it's an illegal war against everything you believe in.
translation.zh: 这是场非法战争 违背了你的所有信念

translation.en: The war is happening, what I believe doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 战争一触即发 我的信念无关紧要

translation.en: I'm just saying it doesn't have to be you.
translation.zh: 我只是说不一定要你去

translation.en: Bush will definitely owe you one.
And Kofi's term is almost up.
translation.zh: 科菲的任期快结束了 难道…
科菲的任期快结束了 难道… 你懂我 我没在考虑那个
你懂我 我没在考虑那个

translation.en: Soon I'll be leaving the UN,
translation.zh: 很快 我就会离开联合国

translation.en: The boys can come visit us.
translation.zh: 孩子们可以过来看我们

translation.en: Your sons are not children anymore.
translation.zh: 你的儿子已经不是小孩子了

translation.en: My mom will love meeting you.
translation.zh: 我妈妈会很高兴见你的

translation.en: [in English] I'm not picking it up.
Or you can just say no...

translation.zh: 你还好吗 塞尔吉奥？

translation.en: Back home, I'm a fire chief.
translation.zh: 在我家乡 我是一名消防队长
我跑进起火的建筑物里

translation.en: [Kofi Annan] Today, we share our shock and sorrow
translation.zh: 今天 我们失去所爱之人…

translation.en: at the loss of people we loved.
translation.zh: 感到震惊 无比悲痛
克里斯托弗、玛莎、菲奥娜
私下不认识你的人而言

translation.en: Never forget the real challenges and the real rewards
translation.zh: 别忘了为联合国效力的

translation.en: of serving the United Nations are out there in the field...
translation.zh: 真正挑战和奖励在现场…

translation.en: and here we are to help you in any way we can.
translation.zh: 在这里 我们竭尽全力帮你
（塞尔吉奥维耶拉德梅洛的死 是伊拉克的一个转折点）
